subject: Technology
title: Xbox: Microsoft Joins the Battle
description: Learn Xbox: Microsoft Joins the Battle in one minute.

hook.text: In 2001, the world's biggest software company decided it wanted to be a gaming company too.

buildup.text: Microsoft launched the Xbox with Halo, a shooter so good it justified buying the entire console.

discovery.text: Xbox Live brought console gaming online in 2002. Playing with friends across the country became effortless.

twist.text: Microsoft lost billions on the original Xbox. It was a long-term investment, not a short-term business.

climax.text: Xbox proved that online multiplayer was the future. Today, almost every console game connects to the internet.

punchline.text: Microsoft bought its way into gaming and never left.
